entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 8:29 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
